creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two delicate stalks of bamboo, one black, one grey, rising from bottom; smaller, shorter stalk at bottom; two line inscription ULQ; longer inscription LRQ
markings: L side when rolled, Japanese inscription; ULQ, square intaglio:趙養; ULQ, square relief:息心居士; R center, square relief; LRQ, square intaglio; LRQ, square relief;  R side when rolled, Japanese label
signed: UL:安永戊戌朔枸杞園陶斎筆;
title: Bamboo
